bibl.title: New Evidence on Land in the Apollonopolite Nome.
bibl.note: Presents a few interesting aspects of a Greek land survey originating from the Apollonopolite nome (P. Haun. Inv. 407, to be published in the doctoral dissertation of the author), 119/118 B.C. - Sacred land in the Apollonopolite nome. - ἡ ἐν ἀφέσει in the Apollonopolite nome. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume I

bibl.seg: CHRISTENSEN Thorolf, New Evidence on Land in the Apollonopolite Nome.

Isabella ANDORLINI, Guido BASTIANINI, Manfredo MANFREDI e Giovanna MENCI (a cura di), Atti del XXII Congresso Internazionale di Papirologia. Firenze, 23-29 agosto 1998. Volume I (Firenze, 2001) pp. 201-206, 3 tabl.

Presents a few interesting aspects of a Greek land survey originating from the Apollonopolite nome (P. Haun. Inv. 407, to be published in the doctoral dissertation of the author), 119/118 B.C. - Sacred land in the Apollonopolite nome. - ἡ ἐν ἀφέσει in the Apollonopolite nome. - Conclusion.
